DOC.brief_title: Elective Induction v Spontaneous Labour Patients With Heart Disease
DOC.detailed_description: Induction labour do oxytocin . An infusion 30U oxytocin dilute 500ml normal saline prepare give infusion pump initial rate 3mU/min . Subsequently dose increased 3mU/min every 45 min till adequate uterine contraction establish . Epidural analgesia provide wherever feasible Injection Morphine 2-5mg give intravenously pain relief .
DOC.criteria: NYHA class III cephalic presentation singleton gestation previous cesarean section , Primary pulmonary hypertension , Eisenmenger syndrome , Marfan syndrome , Left heart obstruction , Prior cardiac event arrhythmia , Malformed fetus , Severe anemia ( < 7g/dl ) , Intrauterine fetal death , obstetrical indication induction labour patient anticoagulation .
